Saltire | 200px | 200px|borderFlag of Scotland |} ==Techniques in flag display== === Illustrations === Flag illustrations generally depict flags flying from the observer's point of view from left to right, the view known as the obverse (or "front"); the other side is the reverse (or "back"). There are some exceptions, notably some Islamic flags inscribed in Arabic, which is written from right to left; for these the obverse is defined as the side with the hoist to the observer's right. == See also == * Vexillological symbol ==Notes== ==References== ==External links== * Vexillology Vexillology Category:Vexillology
